availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hamilton County, Ohio, farmer and sheriff. Bucks County, Pennsylvania, native. Son of Joshua Calvin and Susan Ann Calvin. Married to Martha Hann Calvin in Berks County, Pennsylvania, in 1831. Father of Anna Calvin, Bettie Calvin, and Mattie Calvin. Farmer in Hamilton County, Ohio, in 1850. Farmer in Hamilton County in 1860. Sheriff in Hamilton County in 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Crosby Township, p. 312B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Harrison, p. 479.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Harrison Township, p. 450B.
Henry A. Ford and Kate B. Ford, History of Hamilton County, Ohio: With Illustrations and Biographical Sketches (L. A. Williams & Co., 1881), 314.
"Richard Calvin (1807-1882)," Find A Grave, Memorial 168356747, accessed October 12, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/168356747.
